sodiumdynamiclights.menu.title: SodiumDynamicLights Settings
sodiumdynamiclights.menu.canvas.1: Disabling entities dynamic lighting is recommended with Canvas!
sodiumdynamiclights.menu.canvas.2: Dynamic lighting with Canvas is currently performance heavy!
sodiumdynamiclights.tooltip.creeper_ligh:
Sets the Creeper dynamic lighting mode.
- %s disables Creeper dynamic lighting.
- %s sets a constant luminance.
- %s sets a dynamic luminance.
sodiumdynamiclights.tooltip.entities: Enables entities dynamic lighting. Note: players are always active.
sodiumdynamiclights.tooltip.mode.1: Enables dynamic lights. If enabled a player holding a torch will light up the area for example.
sodiumdynamiclights.tooltip.mode.2: %s and %s will lag a bit behind but minimizes light updates.
sodiumdynamiclights.tooltip.self_light_s: Enables first-person dynamic lighting. It's recommended to disable this if you're using shaders that has their own dynamic lighting.
sodiumdynamiclights.tooltip.tnt_lighting:
Sets the TNT dynamic lighting mode.
- %s disables TNT dynamic lighting.
- %s sets a constant luminance.
- %s sets a dynamic luminance.
sodiumdynamiclights.tooltip.water_sensit: Enables the water-sensitive light sources check. This means that some items will not emit light while being submerged in water.
sodium.dynamiclights.options.mode.desc: Configures the update rate for dynamic light sources
sodium.dynamiclights.options.self.desc: Enables first-person dynamic lighting. It's recommended to disable this if you're using shaders that has their own dynamic lighting.
sodium.dynamiclights.options.entities.de: If enabled, entities (such as mobs and dropped items) will have dynamic lighting.
sodium.dynamiclights.options.blockentiti: If enabled, block entities will have dynamic lighting.
Enables the water-sensitive light sources check. This means that some items will not emit light while being submerged in water.
sodium.dynamiclights.options.tnt.desc: Configures the update rate for TNT lighting.
sodium.dynamiclights.options.creeper.des: Configures the update rate for Creeper lighting.
